name:
Music on:
Acoustic Guitar
description:
An acoustic guitar in your pocket!

Play your favourite songs easily, thanks to the pre-selection chord option, and enjoy the sound quality achieved. Hear the fingers on the frets and the nails while strumming!

A directory of over 900 chords shows you how to place your fingers on a real guitar and let's you listen to them while selected.

5 different styles will accompany you to set the mood.
